sentences.en: Busy boasts chug and scurry about the river - racy speed boat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往 - --高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

sentences.en: Busy boasts chug and scurry about the river racy speedboat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往——高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

sentences.en: Chug Chug Chug , Toot Toot Toot Here we go!
sentences.cn: 轧轧轧,嘟嘟嘟我们出发了!

sentences.en: He can really chug his beer.
sentences.cn: 他可以一口气喝掉他的啤酒.

sentences.en: I stood and watched the train chug around the loop of track without me.
sentences.cn: 我站在那里看小火车吱吱嘎嘎地在环形轨道上自己开着.

sentences.en: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentences.cn: 离老远，我都能听到农机具的突突声。

sentences.en: Small motorboats chug out of the harbour.
The loser of a game is required to chug a beer.
sentences.cn: 输掉比赛的人要喝干一杯啤酒.

sentences.en: The train chugs down the track.
sentences.cn: 火车沿着轨道嘎嚓嘎嚓地缓慢行驶着。

trans.tran_cn: （发动机缓慢运转时发出的）突突声
发出（持续而单调的）短声，发出突突声，（发动机等）咔嚓咔嚓地响，（火车、汽船等）咔嚓咔嚓地前进
